OptionsMenuOption.message: Change of options for current tab (and page)

OptionsMenuOptionDescription.message: Enable/Disable the options of YouTube, YouTube Music, and Other Sites for the current tab (and page) from the popup

PopupExplanation.message: *the window that appears when you click the extension's icon

ThumbnailsAppearance.message: Select how you want the thumbnails on YouTube to appear (if the 'Thumbnails' option is enabled):

avatarsDescription.message: Hides the images of channel/user avatars

avatarsTooltip.message:
Hides the images of
channel/user avatars

command1Description.message: Enable/Disable the extension on the current tab

continueWatchingPrompt_text.message: Disable the 'Video Paused. Continue Watching?' prompt when the option Video is enabled

control_buttons_text.message: Control buttons (play, volume etc) will be always visible along with progress bar

currentPageTooltip.message:
Configure the extension's function
for this page only. When the page
changes, these settings are removed

currentTabTooltip.message:
Configure the extension's function
for this tab only

embeddedDescription.message: Enable or disable the extension and the corresponding options for YouTube videos embedded in sites

embeddedTooltip.message:
YouTube videos embedded
in other sites

enabledByDefault_text.message: When you open a new tab the extension will be enabled by default

extDescription.message: Blocks the video keeping only the audio on YouTube and YouTube Music.

google_searchDescription.message: Hides various images in Google search such as the video thumbnails

google_searchTooltip.message:
Hides various images
in Google search

hideLogo_text.message: Remove Music Mode for YouTubeâ„¢ logo that it is added on the videos

live_144_text.message: Set automatically the quality of live videos to 144p when the option Video is enabled on YouTube (since YouTube live videos are not blocked but only hidden)

offTooltip.message: Disable the extension for all tabs

onTooltip.message: Enable the extension for all tabs

other_imagesDescription.message: Hides various other images (channel art etc)

pageOffTooltip.message: Disable the extension for this page

pageOnTooltip.message: Enable the extension for this page

pageXTooltip.message: Remove the settings for this page

privacy_policy_text.message: The extension does not collect any kind of user data. The user options are stored locally in the user's browser

progress_bar_text.message: The progress bar will always be visible on YouTube videos (not emebedded) when the option Video is enabled for YouTube

progress_bar_title.message: Always visible progress bar & control buttons

quickAccessButtonsImagesDescription.message: Adds a button on YouTube topbar, from which you can hide/show the images of the page (these settings will only apply to the current page)

quickAccessButtonsVideoDescription.message: Adds a button on YouTube video toolbar from which you can hide/show the video (these settings will only apply to the current page)

showVideoThumbnail.message: Show video thumbnail in video player

showVideoThumbnail_text.message: Display the video thumbnail in the video player when the video is blocked

tabOffTooltip.message: Disable the extension for this tab

tabOnTooltip.message: Enable the extension for this tab

tabXTooltip.message: Remove the settings for this tab

tempOptionDescription.message: Enable/Disable the extension for only one page from the popup

themeChannel.message: Channel <svg viewBox='0 0 24 24' preserveAspectRatio='xMidYMid meet' focusable='false' style='pointer-events: none; display: block; width: 10px; height: 15px; margin-left: 3px; fill: #606060'><g viewBox='0 0 24 24' class='style-scope yt-icon'><path fill='none' d='M0 0h24v24H0z' class='style-scope yt-icon'></path><path d='M12 3v10.55c-.59-.34-1.27-.55-2-.55-2.21 0-4 1.79-4 4s1.79 4 4 4 4-1.79 4-4V7h4V3h-6z' class='style-scope yt-icon'></path></g></svg>

tip_1.message: If you have enabled the options Thumbnails, Ad Skipper and Avatars (plus, Other Images on YouTube) the images are not only hidden but also blocked. As a result, more bandwidth is saved and the page loads faster.

tip_2.message: Use the keyboard shortcut Ctrl + M to enable the extension for the current tab with the options that you have selected on the options page. (the shortcut will not work if it is used from another extension)

videoDescription.message: Blocks the video keeping only the audio (the video in live stream is hidden but not blocked)

videoTooltip.message:
Blocks the video keeping
only the audio
